2025-05-13.title: Intel Certifies Shell Lubricant for Cooling AI Data Centers
2025-05-13.description: Intel Corp. has certified Shell Plc’s lubricant-based method for cooling servers more efficiently within data centers used for artificial intelligence.

2025-05-08.title: Apple Is Developing Specialized Chips for Glasses, New Macs and AI Servers
2025-05-08.description: Apple Inc.’s silicon design group is working on new chips that will serve as the brains for future devices, including its first smart glasses, more powerful Macs and artificial intelligence servers.
